title: Flood QRF - San Diego’s Restoration Experts

hero.heading: 24/7 Emergency Services
hero.subheading: San Diego County’s trusted water restoration experts.

trust_bar.title: Insurance support
trust_bar.description: We help simplify the claims process.

services.title: Water Extraction
services.description: Fast removal of standing water and source containment to prevent further damage.

services.title: Structural Drying
services.description: Industrial drying and dehumidification with daily monitoring to protect your structure.

services.title: Mold Remediation
services.description: Containment and safe remediation to protect air quality and prevent recurrence.

services.title: Sewage Cleanup
services.description: Category 3 cleanup and sanitization performed safely and professionally.

services.title: Insurance Claims Assistance
services.description: We provide documentation and work with your adjuster to keep the process moving.

additional_services.heading: Additional Services
additional_services.subheading: One team from mitigation through clean finish — so your project stays on track.

items.title: Pack-outs
items.description: Careful contents packing, inventory, hauling, and secure storage to protect what matters.

items.title: Selective Demolition
items.description: Controlled tear-out of affected materials to enable proper drying and restoration.

items.title: Post-construction Cleaning
items.description: Final detailed clean to remove dust, debris, and residue — ready for move-in.

steps.title: Call or request service
steps.description: We triage the situation and dispatch a crew ASAP.

steps.title: Contain + mitigate
steps.description: Stop the loss, extract water, set equipment, and document conditions.

steps.title: Dry + monitor
steps.description: Daily moisture checks and adjustments until drying goals are met.

steps.title: Wrap up
steps.description: Clear completion notes, photos, and next-step guidance.

our_story.heading: Our Story
our_story.excerpt: Flood QRF was built to bring disciplined, fast, and honest restoration service to San Diego County. We show up ready, communicate clearly, and treat your home like it’s our own.

members.name: Lead Technician
members.bio: Field lead focused on containment, drying strategy, and documentation.

members.name: Project Manager
members.bio: Coordinates equipment, timelines, and insurer documentation.

members.name: Contents Specialist
members.bio: Inventory, packing, and storage — protecting belongings end-to-end.

items.a: We offer 24/7 emergency response and prioritize rapid dispatch. Call for the quickest ETA.
Yes. We document the loss with photos and moisture logs and can coordinate with your adjuster as needed.
We focus on mitigation, selective demo, and cleaning. If rebuild is needed, we can coordinate next steps.
